text: Jan Gąsienica Ciaptak (17 December 1922 - 29 October 2009) was a Polish alpine skier. He competed at the 1948, 1952 and the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Polish male alpine skiers Category:Polish male ski jumpers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Poland Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Poland Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Ski jumpers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zakopane
title: Jan Gąsienica Ciaptak
